extendedIngredients.name: mixed mushrooms
extendedIngredients.original: 1 pound mixed mushrooms, such as shiitake and oyster, stemmed and thickly sliced

extendedIngredients.name: olive oil
extendedIngredients.original: 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil

title: Celery and Mushroom Salad with Shaved Parmigiano
summary: Celery and Mushroom Salad with Shaved Parmigiano might be just the side dish you are searching for. This gluten free and primal recipe serves 4 and costs $3.21 per serving. One serving contains 255 calories, 11g of protein, and 20g of fat. A mixture of salt and pepper, lemon juice, olive oil, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so yummy. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 25 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 62%. This score is pretty good. Similar recipes include Baby Celery and Shitake Mushroom Salad with Lemon and Parmigiano-Reggiano, Shaved Celery, Celery Root, and Radish Salad, and Shaved Zucchini Salad with Parmigiano and Pistachios.
instructions: In a large skillet, heat 3 tablespoons of olive oil. Add the mushrooms, season with salt and pepper and cook over high heat, stirring occasionally, until golden, 7 to 8 minutes. Transfer to a plate and let cool slightly.                                              In a large bowl, whisk the remaining 3 tablespoons of olive oil with the lemon juice and season with salt and pepper. Add the celery, mushrooms and cheese shavings and toss gently. Serve right away.

steps.step: In a large skillet, heat 3 tablespoons of olive oil.
Add the mushrooms, season with salt and pepper and cook over high heat, stirring occasionally, until golden, 7 to 8 minutes.
Transfer to a plate and let cool slightly.
In a large bowl, whisk the remaining 3 tablespoons of olive oil with the lemon juice and season with salt and pepper.
Add the celery, mushrooms and cheese shavings and toss gently.
